attributes.title: wish i could less than one star

attributes.title: Stinky
attributes.review: I got the app and it was going very well but then I realized I couldn’t vote for Manny who WILL NOT BE TELEVISED, and I smelt a stinky coming from the app and when I deleted it the stinky was gone :)

attributes.title: Fake news
attributes.review: It was very glitchy and totally ruined my phone.

attributes.title: Covfefe
attributes.review: Very disappointed. As a good christian American, I was looking forward to voting for Mr. Trump. Unfortunately, after downloading this app, I turned into a cheeto and my house burned down. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Terrible app! Terrible person! Once I downloaded it my phone was filled with stupidity! Will never vote for this loser!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review:
Right when i downloaded this app, my dog of  14 years named Martha ran away. This is such a horrible app, Martha😁was🥰an🙃average🐕dog. She went💨aërf🍒&🤕ærph😪&👻EEEER🧟‍♀️Foreigner💕
Definitely will never download again.

attributes.title: horrid
attributes.review: as soon as i got the app my best friend got terrible sick. and she was perfectly fine seconds before but it was as if the app knew me and my peers previously. this isn’t a coincidence the second it downloaded onto my phone my friend had to be sent to the hospital. this is horrid

attributes.title: Not good
attributes.review: I wish I could give this 0 stars it’s terrible and I downloaded this app then my dog got ran over 👿

attributes.title: Nothing works
attributes.review: Totally disappointed. Nothing works or opens
